entry.title: Priorities
entry.summary: Why is it that Rutgers cancels classes hours before a football game, and surely would if there were classes during Super Bowl times… but both of my classes were scheduled to meet on election night???
entry.content: Why is it that Rutgers cancels classes hours before a football game, and surely would if there were classes during Super Bowl times… but both of my classes were scheduled to meet on election night???
